      Parameters:
      email - player's email address
      Returns:
      Player object
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if player does not exist

    • registerPlayer

      public Player registerPlayer(Player newPlayer) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Saves a new Player object in the database and returns it.
      Parameters:
      newPlayer - Player object to be saved
      Returns:
      Player object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if player with same email already exists

    • loginPlayer

      public Player loginPlayer(Map<String,String> credentials) throws NoSuchElementException, LoginException
      Logs in player based on credentials and returns logged in Player object.
      Parameters:
      credentials - email and password of player to be logged in
      Returns:
      logged in Player object
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if player with given email doesn't exist
      LoginException - if password is incorrect

    • deleteAllPlayers

      public void deleteAllPlayers()
      Deletes all players from the database.

    • updatePlayerName

      public Player updatePlayerName(String email, String newName) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Updates player name and returns Player object.
      Parameters:
      email - email of player by which Player object is identified
      newName - new name for Player object
      Returns:
      Player object with updated name
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if new name is empty or player with new name already exists
